articles.description: LeBron James is signing with PepsiCo after almost 18 years at rival Coca-Cola. James will be promoting a new Mountain Dew energy drink.
articles.content:
LeBron James has officially switched from Coke to Pepsi. 
James and PepsiCo officially announced a multi-year partnership on Wednesday, according to Mike McCarthy of Front Office Sports. James previ… [+2012 chars]

articles.title: United States Threatens To Ban Cathay Pacific Flights - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: Here's why the US and Hong Kong are in an aviation dispute that could lead to Cathay Pacific being banned from flying to the US.
articles.content: Could Hong Kong’s strict (and arguably unfair) quarantine requirement lead to Cathay Pacific being banned from flying to the US? A new US Department of Transportation (DOT) filing suggests that this … [+4921 chars]

articles.title: VW's battery strategy stuns S. Korean suppliers, report says - Automotive News Europe
articles.description: The automaker's decision to switch to a different type of battery cell in two years came as a shock to LG Energy Solution and SK Innovation, Reuters reported.

articles.title: Congress eyes extending PPP deadline for businesses, as billions sit untouched - CNN
articles.description: Lawmakers are rushing to extend the federal government's key relief program for small business owners as the deadline to apply for a loan from the Paycheck Protection Program approaches with more than $110 billion still untouched.
